page.title: 06Farming in Woodplumpton cont
page.content: to be sold.All the stock are home bred. {Machines} include a mower,slurry tank,3 tractors and a sprayer. {Whinneyfield Farm} is part of Tom Barron Estate which covers about 650 acres.Whinneyfield is 120 acres and is a {dairy farm} producing 420 gallons per day used on local milk rounds.A herd consists of 125 fresian cows.There is a milking parlour for ten cows.A farmer breeds his own stock and visits Preston and Brock markets mainly to sell surplus.There are many large {machines} on the farm,2 mowers,a silo,a plough,a slurry tank,a sprayer,2 tractors,3 forage wagons,3 slurry tankers,1 milk tanker and 1 industrial loading shovel. Many small farms in this area have been sold and made into larger units during recent years.
